summary:
This follower is very skilled in the art of combat and magic he will help you in battles he can defeat a dragon very fast and other creatures he can also be summoned WORK IN PROGRESS

you can find him in the sleeping-giant inn in riverwood
descriptionHtml: this follower has a back story he was found by a khajiit trading caravan when passing through labyrinthian the took him and left labyrinthian they took care of him until he was 7 then the sent him of the honorhall orphanage when he was 14 he ran away and stayed in a cave until he was 17 he left and ran off to riverwood and stayed in the inn since then he recently killed a dragon and absorbed its soul and he found out he was dragonborn. he is a very powerful follower.
author: Skykhajiit55
